data.name: Chubmen's Strange Case File~Chapter Of Corridor~
data.detailed_description:
FEATURE
★4 character to select
★10 difficulties to select
★Beautiful sticker style picture
★Interesting scene
★rich and sounds good BGM

POSTSCRIPT
This game is adapted from my comic.
There is story mode, so don't worry about not looked the original comic.
I wanted to make a networking game,
however, the network technology is too hard so I deleted the network mode,
instead, used local multiplay mode.
Players can use STEAM's Remote Play Together or PARSEC or other third share screen platforms for online connection.
It would be great if you play it with your friends.
data.about_the_game:
FEATURE
★4 character to select
★10 difficulties to select
★Beautiful sticker style picture
★Interesting scene
★rich and sounds good BGM

POSTSCRIPT
This game is adapted from my comic.
There is story mode, so don't worry about not looked the original comic.
I wanted to make a networking game,
however, the network technology is too hard so I deleted the network mode,
instead, used local multiplay mode.
Players can use STEAM's Remote Play Together or PARSEC or other third share screen platforms for online connection.
It would be great if you play it with your friends.
data.short_description: Action game，it surport 2 players to multiplay by screen share. Control several characters to fight with ghost in corridor building. use keyboard Z to attack, use X to dodge.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: all OK
  • Additional Notes: win 7 system at least need DirectX 11
